name: Imaging Sales Report
query:
SELECT 
    S.patient AS "Patient:Data:100", 
    S.patient_name AS "Patient Name:Data:250", 
    S.posting_date AS "Date:Date:150", 
    COALESCE(S.ref_practitioner, S.oustside) AS "Doctor:Data:200", 
    I.item_code AS "Service Name:Data:250", 
    I.qty AS "Qty", 
    R.section AS "Section:Data:80",
    ROUND(I.rate, 2) AS "Rate:Currency:100", 
    ROUND(I.net_amount, 2) AS "Net Rate:Currency:100",
    S.commission AS "Commission:Currency:100",
    S.employee AS "Employee",
    S.insurance AS "Insurance",
    U.full_name AS "Owner Name:Data:200"
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice` S
JOIN 
    `tabSales Invoice Item` I ON S.name = I.parent
JOIN 
    `tabRadiology Template` R ON I.item_code = R.name  
LEFT JOIN 
    `tabUser` U ON S.owner = U.name  -- Joining with the user table to get owner's full name
WHERE 
    S.docstatus = 1
    and S.status !="Credit Note Issued"
    and is_return !=1
    AND S.posting_date BETWEEN %(Start_date)s AND %(End_date)s
    AND I.Item_group IN ("Imaging", "ECO", "ECG","Endoscopy", "COLONOSCOPY");
